Package in.cs699.tensors.delagram.content_view_service.repository

Interface ContentViewRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContentViewRepositoryFirebase
    public interface ContentViewRepository
    The interface that abstracts the services available for persistance/database access, in this microservice.
    Author:
    swaroop_nath

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<Memory> fetchMemoriesForUser​(String userID)
      An abstraction that allows the currently logged in user to fetch the memories of the particular user their circle.
      User fetchUserByID​(String currentUserID)
      An abstraction that allows to fetch the user associated with a certain user id.
      void registerReport​(Report newReport, String uniqueReportID)
      An abstraction that allows to register report on a memory into the database, for manual scrutiny later on.
      void updateUserMemories​(String reactedUserID, List<Memory> uploadedMemories)
      An abstraction that allows to update the memories of a user in the circle of the currently logged in user.

    • Method Detail

      • fetchMemoriesForUser

        List<Memory> fetchMemoriesForUser​(String userID)
                           throws FeedLoadFailedException
        An abstraction that allows the currently logged in user to fetch the memories of the particular user their circle.
        Parameters:
        userID - The user id of the user in the circle of the currently logged in user.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of memories that belongs to the user in the circle.
        Throws:
        FeedLoadFailedException - Thrown in case memories for this particular user in circle couldn't be loaded.

      • fetchUserByID

        User fetchUserByID​(String currentUserID)
            throws InternalServerException
        An abstraction that allows to fetch the user associated with a certain user id.
        Parameters:
        currentUserID - The id for which the user has to be fetched.
        Returns:
        Returns the user corresponding to the user id.
        Throws:
        InternalServerException - Thrown in case some kind of error arises in fetching.

      • updateUserMemories

        void updateUserMemories​(String reactedUserID,
                        List<Memory> uploadedMemories)
        An abstraction that allows to update the memories of a user in the circle of the currently logged in user. This can be used to update stars and comments for a particular memory.
        Parameters:
        reactedUserID - The id of the user who gave a star or a comment.
        uploadedMemories - The memories of the user in the circle on whose memory star/comment has been made.

      • registerReport

        void registerReport​(Report newReport,
                    String uniqueReportID)
        An abstraction that allows to register report on a memory into the database, for manual scrutiny later on.
        Parameters:
        newReport - The report object, outlining the details of the report.
        uniqueReportID - A unique identifier for the report to be registered.
